name: CarbonCreditTokenExposure
description: A Carbon Credit Token Exposure Implementation.

parameterDecorators.name: bundle_
parameterDecorators.description: the bundle where the GCO2 currently sits.

parameterDecorators.name: amount_
parameterDecorators.description: the amount of tokens to offset.

returnDecorators.description: the amount of offsetted tokens after fee.

functionDecorators.name: swapBundle
functionDecorators.description: Swaps a given GCO2 token between bundles.

parameterDecorators.name: sourceBundle_
parameterDecorators.description: the bundle where the GCO2 token currently sits.

parameterDecorators.name: targetBundle_
parameterDecorators.description: the bundle where the GCO2 token should be bundled into.

parameterDecorators.name: amount_
parameterDecorators.description: the amount of tokens to swap.

returnDecorators.description: the amount of tokens arriving in the bundle (after fee).
